GR14ss5_bhku:9588: guruḥ śāstraṃ śraddhā rucir anugatiḥ siddhir iti me
GR14ss5_bhku:9589: yad etat tat sarvaṃ caraṇa-kamalaṃ rājati yayoḥ /
GR14ss5_bhku:9591: sadā rādhā-kṛṣṇāv śaraṇa-gatī tau mama gatiḥ //
